text: Ani tya lokanni apalyajavala jnana ye'una pohocalyanantara matabheda kela (kevala) hattapayi ani jara tumacya palanakartyace pharmana eka nirdharita avadhiparyarnta adhipasuna niscita kele gele nasate tara tyanca phaisala kevhaca jhala asata ani jyanna, tyancyanantara grantha dila gela ahe, tehi tyacya sambandhane sansayata padale aheta
